countryData.interestingFact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris was once the tallest man-made structure in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
India is home to the Taj Mahal, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Japan has over 6,800 islands, including Hokkaido and Okinawa.
Australia is both a country and a continent.
Egypt is famous for the ancient Pyramids of Giza.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Italy is home to the smallest country in the world, Vatican City.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Cape Town, and Bloemfontein.
